BASIC_GIT.title: git init
BASIC_GIT.description: Initializes a new Git repository in the current directory.

BASIC_GIT.title: git clone <repo_url>
BASIC_GIT.description: Clones a repository from a remote URL to your local machine.

BASIC_GIT.title: git status
BASIC_GIT.description: Shows the working directory status (modified, staged, untracked files).

BASIC_GIT.title: git add <file>
BASIC_GIT.description: Stages a file or files to be committed.

BASIC_GIT.title: git commit -m "message"
BASIC_GIT.description: Commits staged changes to the local repository with a message.

BASIC_GIT.title: git push
BASIC_GIT.description: Pushes committed changes to the remote repository.

BASIC_GIT.title: git pull
BASIC_GIT.description: Fetches and merges changes from the remote repository into the local branch.

BASIC_GIT.title: git fetch
BASIC_GIT.description: Downloads objects and references from a remote repository without merging.

BASIC_GIT.title: git merge <branch_name>
BASIC_GIT.description: Merges changes from the specified branch into the current branch.

BASIC_GIT.title: git log
BASIC_GIT.description: Displays the commit history of the repository.

BASIC_GIT.title: git diff
BASIC_GIT.description: Shows differences between the working directory and staged changes.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git branch
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Lists all branches in the repository.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git checkout -b <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Creates a new branch and switches to it.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git merge <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Merges the specified branch into the current branch.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git rebase <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Reapplies commits from one branch onto another branch.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git branch -D <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Force deletes the specified local branch.

BRANCHING_GIT.title: git remote set-head origin <branch_name>
BRANCHING_GIT.description: Sets the default branch for the remote repository.
